name: Baldi's Basics Akward School Chapter 5
description:
THIS IS THE FINAL CHAPTER OF BALDI'S BASICS AKWARD SCHOOL!!!

Collect All 7 Notebooks And Escape The School To Fight The Boss! When You Are In The Boss Scene Avoid Baldies And Touch An Tiny Cube To Unlock The Cube Exit To Win And Remove Baldies!

This Game It's Kinda Hard But I Will Make A Vidéo Of This Game So Watch This If You Want To Know How To Beat The Game!
